items.title: Emotionele Celtic-manager verdedigt zichzelf stevig in aanloop naar Old Firm
items.summary: De druk op Celtic-manager Wilfried Nancy is in korte tijd enorm geworden. In aanloop naar de Old Firm tegen Rangers, zaterdag op Celtic Park, voelde Nancy zich genoodzaakt om uitgebreid en emotioneel tekst en uitleg te geven. De kraker tegen de aartsrivaal geldt nu al als de belangrijkste wedstrijd van zijn nog prille periode in Glasgow - en mogelijk zelfs als een beslissend moment voor zijn toekomst.

items.title: West Ham United legt 23 miljoen euro op tafel voor nieuwe spits
items.summary: In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in het buitenland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in Nederland.

items.title: Farioli kan met FC Porto verder uitlopen na misstap Sporting
items.summary: Sporting Portugal heeft vrijdagavond een pas op de plaats gemaakt in de Portugese titelstrijd. De regerend kampioen kwam op bezoek bij Gil Vicente niet verder dan een gelijkspel. Het FC Porto van Francesco Farioli kan zondag profiteren.

items.title: Feyenoord op het punt om Carranza met winst te verkopen aan Mexicaanse club
items.summary: Feyenoord staat op het punt om Juli√°n Carranza definitief van de hand te doen. De spits werd vroegtijdig teruggehaald van een uitleenbeurt aan Leicester City. Hij wordt naar verwachting voor een miljoenenbedrag verkocht aan het Mexicaanse Necaxa.

items.title: McIlroy 'would be OK' with DeChambeau, LIV players returning to PGA Tour
items.summary: Rory McIlroy believes golf needs its best players to compete more regularly against each other and would welcome a return from LIV of the likes of Bryson DeChambeau and Jon Rahm.

items.title: Eerste training Afellay bij PSV had flink wat voeten in de aarde
items.summary: Ibrahim Afellay is vrijdag begonnen aan zijn baan als assistent-trainer bij PSV. Hij stond vrijdagavond voor het eerst aan de zijde van Peter Bosz op het trainingsveld, al had dat flink wat voeten in de aarde.

items.summary: Speaking on the Transfer Show, Mark McAdam and James Savundra break the news that Manchester United explored the conditions to sign Brighton's Carlos Baleba this month - and that Adam Wharton and Elliot Anderson are on their shortlist.

items.title: Man Utd explore conditions for Baleba signing in January
items.summary: Manchester United have explored the conditions of signing Brighton's Carlos Baleba in January, Sky Sports News can reveal.

items.title: Sources: Rosenior frontrunner to replace Maresca
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading candidate to succeed Enzo Maresca as Chelsea head coach, sources have told ESPN.

items.summary: Pep Guardiola has reiterated his desire to stay on at Manchester City amid fresh rumours surrounding Enzo Maresca.

items.title: Liam Rosenior opens door to Chelsea job but must wait on BlueCo dealings
items.summary: Englishman will be in Strasbourg dugout against Nice ‚ÄòIn terms of other clubs, I‚Äôve had a lot of interest‚Äô Liam Rosenior has opened the door to becoming Chelsea‚Äôs head coach by admitting there are no guarantees he will remain at Strasbourg for the rest of the season. The 41-year-old is the leading contender to replace Enzo Maresca, who left on New Year‚Äôs Day, and progress is expected soon. The main obstacle to be overcome is that BlueCo, the investment vehicle that owns Chelsea and Strasbourg, is keen to be sensitive to the needs of both clubs. A quality replacement for Rosenior at Strasbourg must be lined up before the Englishman can leave the Ligue 1 side. Continue reading...

items.title: ‚ÄòYou guys kill me‚Äô: Wilfried Nancy hits back at critics before Old Firm battle
items.summary: Celtic manager has lost five of seven games in charge Job under threat if he loses to Rangers on Saturday Wilfried Nancy has launched an impassioned defence of his credentials to manage Celtic, asking his critics to apply context and claiming the media have tried to ‚Äúkill‚Äù him during his troubled early weeks at the club. The reality is that his job will come under serious threat should Celtic lose Saturday‚Äôs Old Firm fixture. The 2-0 loss to Motherwell on Tuesday was the fifth reverse of his seven games in charge. The performance at Fir Park was especially dismal, which raised the latest set of questions about the former Columbus Crew coach‚Äôs suitability for his role. If Rangers win at Celtic Park they would draw level with their oldest foes despite their own unconvincing start to the campaign. Both trail Hearts in the Premiership. Continue reading...

items.title: Clare Balding remembers 'one of a kind' father Ian
items.summary: Clare Balding has paid tribute to her "fearless, funny and charming" father Ian following his death on Friday at the age of 87.

items.title: Arteta calls for Gyokeres to embrace the noise amid Arsenal title charge
items.summary: Mikel Arteta has called for Viktor Gyokeres and his Arsenal team-mates to embrace the noise surrounding the squad, while also insisting it will "click" for the Swedish striker eventually in north London.

items.title: 'I need time - it's normal you guys kill me' - Nancy's plea before Old Firm test
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy launches a passionate defence of his methods and stresses the need for time if he is to succeed at Celtic.
